prompt_text: I just got promoted at work, I am so happy!
I can't believe he betrayed my trust, it hurts so much.

Wow, I didn't expect this surprise party, thank you!
I am so excited to travel to Abuja next week!
I feel so lonely without my friends around.

The smell in this room is so disgusting.
